title: Identify the Oxidation Process
text: In a redox reaction, oxidation refers to the loss of electrons. Look at the reactants and products to determine which element is losing electrons.

title: Determine the Change in Oxidation State
text: Consider the change in oxidation state for aluminum (Al) from the reactants to the products. What is the oxidation state of Al in Al(s) and $$Al3+aq$$?

title: Write the Oxidation Half-Reaction
text: Once you have identified the element being oxidized and the change in its oxidation state, write the half-reaction showing the loss of electrons.

title: Complete the Oxidation Half-Reaction
text: Write the oxidation half-reaction for aluminum (Al) as it loses electrons to form Al3+.
